titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow entry of peanut butter and paste manufactured from Mexican peanuts in foreign trade zones, without being subject to a tariff-rate quota.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/12/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to exempt from tariff-rate quotas certain Mexican peanut butter and paste manufactured in, and entered from, a foreign-trade zone.
